backup.confirm: Are you sure you want to create a new backup, the previous backup will be replaced?
backup.info: A backup can be created and restored in an emergency case.
backup.info2: Backup contains the current software and clock and wifi settings.
backup.info3: Restore can be triggered from here or by creating an empty file named bot.restore on the sd-card.
backup.title: backup

datetime.save_msg: update request sent, clock will restart now
datetime.title: Date & Time

info.msg_details: Changes here may result in a not properly working clock.
info.msg_into: Please be very careful with this settings.
info.title: warning

restart.msg: A restart is required to activate the changes on this page.
restart.msg_reboot: reboot: will reboot the clock (will take 1 minute).
restart.msg_restart: restart: will only restart the clock and the configuration service.
restart.req2_reboot: The reboot will take about 1 minute.
restart.req2_restart: The restart will take about 5 seconds.
restart.req2_shutdown: You will need to unplug the powersupply and plugin again to start the clock.
restart.req_reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot the system?
restart.req_restart: Are you sure you want to restart the application?
restart.req_sent_reboot: Reboot request was sent, application is restarted. Please wait.
restart.req_sent_restart: Restart request was sent, application is restarted. Please wait.
restart.req_sent_shutdown: Shutdown request sent, the clock is going to shutdown now.
restart.req_shutdown: Are you sure you want to shutdown the system?
restart.title: restart

restore.confirm: Are you sure you want to restore the latest backup? The current software incl. settings and Wifi configuration will be replaced.
restore.done: Restore successful, application is restarted. Please wait.
restore.title: restore

update.msg_done: The application will be restarted after the update.
update.msg_new: An updated software version is available.
update.msg_old: Your software version is up to date.
update.title: software update

wifi.confirm_question: Are you sure you want to delete this connection?
wifi.confirm_question2: When the last connection is deleted a default one will be created.
wifi.title: wifi

themes.delete_msg: Do you really want to delete the selected theme?
themes.remove_confirm_msg: Are you sure to delete the current theme?
themes.title: themes

timers.name: name
timers.remove_confirm_msg: Are you sure to delete the current timer?
timers.title: timers
